rules.natural: If GlobalTech develops an AI harvesting system, then GlobalTech implements the AI harvesting system in the California region.
If GlobalTech implements the AI harvesting system in the California region, then GlobalTech maintains its regional supply chain.
The California region experiences drought conditions or the California region experiences labor shortages.
If the California region experiences labor shortages, then GlobalTech maintains its regional supply chain.
If GlobalTech delays AI system deployment, then GlobalTech increases its manual labor force.

rules.prover9_expression: (has_policy(GlobalTech, contingency_planning) -> (-(develops(GlobalTech, AI_harvesting_system) -> maintains(GlobalTech, regional_supply_chain)) -> delays(GlobalTech, AI_system_deployment)))
rules.natural: If GlobalTech has a contingency planning policy, then should GlobalTech developing an AI harvesting system fail to result in GlobalTech maintaining its regional supply chain, GlobalTech delays AI system deployment.
If GlobalTech developing an AI harvesting system fails to cause GlobalTech maintaining its regional supply chain, then GlobalTech does not increase its manual labor force.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(experiences(California_region, drought_conditions) -> maintains(GlobalTech, regional_supply_chain)) -> imports(GlobalTech, produce, Mexico))
rules.natural: If the California region experiencing drought conditions does not lead to GlobalTech maintaining its regional supply chain, then GlobalTech imports produce from Mexico.

facts.natural: GlobalTech develops an AI harvesting system.
GlobalTech has a contingency planning policy.
GlobalTech does not import produce from Mexico.

target.natural: GlobalTech maintains its regional supply chain.
